MARK 6.19 iþ so Herodia naiw imma jah wilda imma usqiman jah ni mahta;
MARK 6.20 unte Herodis ohta sis Iohannen, kunnands ina wair garaihtana jah weihana, jah witaida imma jah hausjands imma manag gatawida jah gabaurjaba imma andhausida.

MARK 6.21 jah waurþans dags gatils, þan Herodis mela gabaurþais seinaizos nahtamat waurhta þaim maistam seinaize jah þusundifadim jah þaim frumistam Galeilaias, MARK 6.22 jah atgaggandein inn dauhtar Herodiadins jah plinsjandein jah galeikandein Heroda jah þaim miþanakumbjandam, qaþ þiudans du þizai maujai:
bidei mik þisƕizuh þei wileis, jah giba þus.
MARK 6.23 jah swor izai þatei
þisƕah þei bidjais mik, giba þus und halba þiudangardja meina.
MARK 6.24 iþ si usgaggandei qaþ du aiþein seinai:
ƕis bidjau?
iþ si qaþ:
haubidis Iohannis þis daupjandins.
MARK 6.25 jah atgaggandei sunsaiw sniumundo du þamma þiudana baþ qiþandei:
wiljau ei mis gibais ana mesa haubiþ Iohannis þis daupjandins.
MARK 6.26 jah gaurs waurþans sa þiudans in þize aiþe jah in þize miþanakumbjandane ni wilda izai ufbrikan.
MARK 6.27 jah suns insandjands sa þiudans spaikulatur, anabauþ briggan haubiþ is.
iþ is galeiþands afmaimait imma haubiþ in karkarai MARK 6.28 jah atbar þata haubiþ is ana mesa jah atgaf ita þizai maujai, jah so mawi atgaf ita aiþein seinai.
MARK 6.29 jah gahausjandans siponjos is qemun jah usnemun leik is jah galagidedun ita in hlaiwa.
MARK 6.30 jah gaïddjedun apaustauleis du Iesua jah gataihun imma allata jah swa filu swe gatawidedun...
...MARK 6.53 jah duatsniwun.
MARK 6.54 jah usgaggandam im us skipa, sunsaiw ufkunnandans ina, MARK 6.55 birinnandans all þata gawi dugunnun ana badjam þans ubil habandans bairan, þadei hausidedun ei is wesi.
MARK 6.56 jah þisƕaduh þadei iddja in haimos aiþþau baurgs aiþþau in weihsa, ana gagga lagidedun siukans jah bedun ina ei þau skauta wastjos is attaitokeina;
jah swa managai swe attaitokun imma, ganesun.
MARK 7.1 Jah gaqemun sik du imma Fareisaieis jah sumai þize bokarje, qimandans us Iairusaulwmim.

MARK 7.2 jah gasaiƕandans sumans þize siponje is gamainjaim handum, þatist unþwahanaim, matjandans hlaibans; MARK 7.3 iþ Fareisaieis jah allai Iudaieis, niba ufta þwahand handuns, ni matjand, habandans anafilh þize sinistane, MARK 7.4 jah af maþla niba daupjand ni matjand, jah anþar ist manag þatei andnemun du haban: daupeinins stikle jah aurkje jah katile jah ligre; MARK 7.5 þaþroh þan frehun ina þai Fareisaieis jah þai bokarjos:
duƕe þai siponjos þeinai ni gaggand bi þammei anafulhun þai sinistans, ak unþwahanaim handum matjand hlaif?
MARK 7.6 iþ is andhafjands qaþ du im þatei waila praufetida Esaïas bi izwis þans liutans, swe gameliþ ist:
so managei wairilom mik sweraiþ, iþ hairto ize fairra habaiþ sik mis.
MARK 7.7 iþ sware mik blotand, laisjandans laiseinins, anabusnins manne;
MARK 7.8 afletandans raihtis anabusn gudis habaiþ þatei anafulhun mannans, daupeinins aurkje jah stikle jah anþar galeik swaleikata manag taujiþ.
MARK 7.9 jah qaþ du im:
waila inwidiþ anabusn gudis, ei þata anafulhano izwar fastaiþ.
MARK 7.10 Moses auk raihtis qaþ:
swerai attan þeinana jah aiþein þeina;
jah:
saei ubil qiþai attin seinamma aiþþau aiþein seinai, dauþau afdauþjaidau.
MARK 7.11 iþ jus qiþiþ:

jabai qiþai manna attin seinamma aiþþau aiþein: kaurban, þatei ist maiþms, þisƕah þatei us mis gabatnis; MARK 7.12 jah ni fraletiþ ina ni waiht taujan attin seinamma aiþþau aiþein seinai, MARK 7.13 blauþjandans waurd gudis þizai anabusnai izwarai, þoei anafulhuþ;
jah galeik swaleikata manag taujiþ.
MARK 7.14 jah athaitands alla þo managein qaþ im:
hauseiþ mis allai jah fraþjaiþ.
MARK 7.15 ni waihts ist utaþro mans inngaggando in ina þatei magi ina gamainjan;
